dt: {bc}a word, verse, or sentence (such as "Able was I ere I saw Elba") or a number (such as 1881) that reads the same backward or forward

et: Greek {it}palindromos{/it} running back again, from {it}palin{/it} back, again + {it}dramein{/it} to run; akin to Greek {it}polos{/it} axis, pole {ma}{mat|pole|}, {mat|dromedary|}{/ma}
shortdef: a word, verse, or sentence (such as "Able was I ere I saw Elba") or a number (such as 1881) that reads the same backward or forward
